channel.title: deterministic-finite-automaton on Hashnopolis
channel.description: Recent content in deterministic-finite-automaton on Hashnopolis

item.title: Valid Number
item.description: Validate if a given string can be interpreted as a decimal number. Some examples: "0" => true " 0.1 " => true "abc" => false "1 a" => false "2e10" => true " -90e3 " => true " 1e" => false "e3" => false " 6e-1" => true " 99e2.5 " => false "53.5e93" => true " --6 " => false "-+3" => false "95a54e53" => false Note It is intended for the problem statement to be ambiguous.
